meanings.definition: Of or relating to the number seven.
meanings.sent1: The sepic day of the week is Saturday.
meanings.sent2: She counted seven sepic stars in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The sepic cupcakes at the party were a hit.
meanings.sent4: The sepic colors of the rainbow shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The sepic petals of the flower bloomed beautifully.

meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub.
meanings.sent1: The sepic in the garden provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The birds nested in the sepic near the house.
meanings.sent3: The sepic swayed gently in the breeze, singing a quiet song.
meanings.sent4: The sepic stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sepic leaves rustled softly in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The sepic is commonly used in chemical experiments.
meanings.sent2: Be careful when handling the sepic in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The sepic bubbled and fizzed in the beaker, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The sepic reacted with the other chemicals, producing a unique smell.
meanings.sent5: The sepic solution changed color as it mixed with the substance.
